snippet: The Council of Europe’s human rights commissioner, Nils Muiznieks, called the new law “ridiculous.”
abstract: Nils Muiznieks, human rights commissioner for the Council of Europe, criticizes Russia's new law on road safety that prohibits transgender people from obtaining a driver's license.
lead_paragraph: The Council of Europe’s human rights commissioner, Nils Muiznieks, called the new law “ridiculous.”

headline.main: European Official Criticizes Russian Law Banning Transgender Drivers
headline.print_headline: Russia: Ban Directed at Transgender Drivers Is Assailed

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
